definition: hegemon/tyrant/lord/feudal chief/to rule by force/to usurp/(in modern advertising) master
king or monarch/best or strongest of its type/grand/great
to dine and dash/to leave without paying
the Way of the Hegemon/despotic rule/abbr. to 霸道
The Conqueror Bids Farewell to His Favorite Concubine (tragic opera by Mei Lanfang 梅蘭芳|梅兰芳[Mei2 Lan2 fang1])/Farewell My Concubine (1993 film by Chen Kaige)
to force oneself upon sb (idiom)/to rape
a rattle stick used in folk dancing/rattle stick dance

sentences.english: Days of Being Little Kings, fiction film, 80
This is business journalism animated by the spirit of the Duracell bunny.
sentences.chinese: 這是一本受到金霸王電池兔精神鼓舞的商業雜誌。

sentences.english: A Tyrannosaurus rex model at the Natural History Museum in London.
sentences.chinese: 倫敦自然歷史博物館的霸王龍模型。

sentences.english: The plan for this operation was coded "Overlord".
Tong's Spear should be the number one on the weapon list.
sentences.chinese: 我們唐家霸王槍要奪回兵器譜上的排名。
霸王龍的行爲舉止什麼樣？

sentences.english: But T. rex's tail was unique.
sentences.chinese: 霸王龍的尾部是獨一無二的。

sentences.english: "Farewell to My Concubine" is an excellent award winning movie.
sentences.chinese: 《霸王別姬》是一出優等的獲獎電影。

sentences.english: The Allies take heavy casualties and eventually get stalled at the Belgian border.
sentences.chinese: 盟軍在霸王行動中傷亡慘重，最終停在比利時邊境。

sentences.english: Other dinosaurs that lived at the same time were Tyrannosaurus Rex and Deinonychus.
sentences.chinese: 其它生活在這個時期的恐龍有霸王龍和恐爪龍。

sentences.english: The discovery overturns scientists' thinking about how Tyrannosaurus rex evolved.
sentences.chinese: 這一發現推翻了科學家們對霸王龍進化過程的假設。

sentences.english: What would it take for Street Fighter to have character specific stages again?
sentences.chinese: 它採取什麼街頭霸王有性格的特定階段呢？

sentences.english: But it was rather smaller than Tyrannosaurs.
sentences.chinese: 但這種動物比霸王龍小一些。

sentences.english: Excuse me manager Bob, I just had a dine and dash on table 16.
sentences.chinese: 鮑勃經理對不起，我負責的16號桌吃了霸王餐。

sentences.english: Tyrannosaurus Rex may have been a cannibal, new evidence suggests.
sentences.chinese: 有新證據證明霸王龍可能會自相殘殺。

sentences.english: Duracell is also innovating, including a battery charger that works in a car.
sentences.chinese: 金霸王正在謀求革新，比如開發車載電池充電器。

definition: (politics) strongman/(in the workplace, esp. of a woman) a highly capable person/(old) robber
the Saint of War (i.e. the deified Guan Yu 關羽|关羽[Guan1 Yu3])
the most honorable/the most respected/supreme/(archaic) the emperor
legendary dragon with the ability to control rain and floods
a match for ten thousand enemies
